verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; afer the manner of Jeduthun. A Psalm of Asaph. I will <S%H6817>cry<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%>, Even unto <S%H430>God<s%> with my <S%H6963>voice<s%>; and he will give ear unto <S%H238>me<s%>.

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H6869>trouble<s%> I <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%>: My <S%H3027>hand<s%> was <S%H5064>stretched<s%> out in the <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H6313>slacked<s%> <S%H5315>not<s%>; My soul <S%H3985>refused<s%> to be <S%H5162>comforted<s%>.
I <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and am <S%H1993>disquieted<s%>: I <S%H7878>complain<s%>, and my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
Thou <S%H270>holdest<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H8109>watching<s%>: I am so <S%H6470>troubled<s%> that I cannot <S%H1696>speak<s%>.
I have <S%H2803>considered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>, The <S%H8141>years<s%> of ancient <S%H5769>times<s%>.

I call to <S%H2142>remembrance<s%> my <S%H5058>song<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>: I <S%H7878>commune<s%> with mine own <S%H3824>heart<s%>; And my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> maketh diligent <S%H2664>search<s%>.
Will the <S%H136>Lord<s%> cast <S%H2186>off<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>? And <S%H3254>will<s%> he be favorable no <S%H7521>more<s%>?
Is his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> clean <S%H656>gone<s%> for <S%H5331>ever<s%>? Doth his <S%H562>promise<s%> <S%H1584>fail<s%> for <S%H1755>evermore<s%>?
Hath <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> to be <S%H2589>gracious<s%>? Hath he in <S%H639>anger<s%> shut <S%H7092>up<s%> his tender <S%H7356>mercies<s%>? <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
And I <S%H559>said<s%>, This is my <S%H2470>infirmity<s%>; But I will remember the <S%H8141>years<s%> of the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> of the Most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
I will make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H4611>deeds<s%> of <S%H3050>Jehovah<s%>; For I will <S%H2142>remember<s%> thy <S%H6382>wonders<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>.
I will <S%H1897>meditate<s%> also upon all thy <S%H6467>work<s%>, And <S%H7878>muse<s%> on thy <S%H5949>doings<s%>.
Thy <S%H1870>way<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, is in the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%>: Who is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H410>god<s%> like unto <S%H410>God<s%>?
Thou art the <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H6213>doest<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%>: Thou hast made <S%H3045>known<s%> thy <S%H5797>strength<s%> among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>.
Thou hast with thine <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%>, The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah
The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H430>thee<s%>, O God; The <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H2342>thee<s%>, they were afraid: The <S%H8415>depths<s%> also <S%H7264>trembled<s%>.
The <S%H5645>clouds<s%> poured <S%H2229>out<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>; The <S%H7834>skies<s%> sent <S%H5414>out<s%> a <S%H6963>sound<s%>: Thine <S%H2687>arrows<s%> also went <S%H1980>abroad<s%>.

The <S%H6963>voice<s%> of thy <S%H7482>thunder<s%> was in the <S%H1534>whirlwind<s%>; The <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> <S%H215>lightened<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%>: The <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H7264>trembled<s%> and <S%H7493>shook<s%>.
Thy <S%H1870>way<s%> was in the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, And thy <S%H7635>paths<s%> in the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, And thy <S%H6119>footsteps<s%> were not <S%H3045>known<s%>.
Thou <S%H5148>leddest<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock<s%>, By the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>.
